name: Hand 2 Hand
description:
Crawl through the cantina and defeat all the bandidos with a good ´ol rock, paper, scissor duel! and if that doesn't work you might need to use your trusty revolver, 

READ ME!!

Controls:
Movement: arrow keys.
Action: 1,2,3,4 number keys or mouse left click.
Interact :Space Bar or mouse left click.
CritBar:  Spacebar.


Made for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2021 by @zhuckly & @porfavormark.

Programing: @zhuckly
Art & Music: @porfavormark

Thanks for playing, your comments and feedback help us get better <3
